widget.title: DeviceOrientation
widget.instructions:
This is an experimental widget, contact mike@thingstud.io with suggestions, problems etc.
This widget accesses the HTML5 Device Orientation API and outputs a stream of messages of the form 
{alpha: xx, beta: xx, gamma: xx}
It displays a message to indicate if the Device OrientationAPI is available and the current orientation data.

Use this as a physical joystick control.

parameters.title: feed
parameters.description: The feed name to output to

template.title: DeviceOrientation
template.html:
{{orientationSupported}}
{{#with orientationData }}
Alpha: {{alpha}}
Beta: {{beta}}
Gamma: {{gamma}}
{{/with}}
